recipeIngredient.@value:
KetoDiet cereal protein bars with figs
                        2

recipeInstructions.@value:
Method

                Using a coarse grater, grate the KetoDiet protein bars. Finely grind the nuts in a food processor and mix them with the grated bars. Add the milk to make a mixture. Using clean hands (otherwise the mixture will become sticky), take a strawberry or a piece of avocado and wrap them in the mixture. Coat each ball in desiccated coconut or high-percentage dark chocolate (if you have completed your diet plan). Put the balls in the fridge for at least an hour. Take out and serve.

                
                    Wishing you an enjoyable meal – the KetoDiet team.
